fragment: Werner Ziegler is a German construction engineer hired by Gustavo Fring to build his underground methamphetamine laboratory.
Lalo Salamanca breaks into Margarethe's house and learns about Werner's crew.
Mrs. Nguyen frequently chides Jimmy for drinking the cucumber water infusion she makes available to salon customers.
David Brightbill is a private investigator hired by Chuck to find proof of Jimmy's sabotage.
Lyle is the assistant manager of the Los Pollos Hermanos restaurant chain's Albuquerque store.
Margarethe Ziegler is the widow of Werner Ziegler.
Everett Acker is a retiree whose home is on land leased from Mesa Verde Bank.
Marion is Jeff's elderly mother whom Jimmy befriends as a ploy to gain the upper hand on Jeff.
Neil Kandy is the owner of an Albuquerque welding shop.
Casey is an employee at Neil Kandy's welding shop.
Lou Schanzer is a retired police officer and Todd Alquist's busybody neighbor.
